selling online holly and berries 2013 materials i hook you can use any hook size as gauge is not important 1 skein green worsted weight i used vanna s choice kelly green 1 skein red worsted weight i used vanna s choice cranberry tapestry needle stitches and terms  chain chain  single_crochet single_crochet  half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  double_crochet double_crochet  slip_stitch slip_stitch  fo fasten_off from home www facebook com/fromhomecrochet holly and berries 2013 holly pattern make 2 chain 11 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook double_crochet into next chain on foundation half_double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook double_crochet into next chain on foundation half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch into last chain chain 2 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch into last chain on foundation this last step creates your end peak on other side of foundation repeat pattern starting with a single_crochet in the next chain after you create your end peak slip_stitch to the first single_crochet to join fo leaving a tail for sewing attach your two leaves by sewing them together at one end on a bit of an angle making a right angle berries pattern make 3 chain 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet fo using your tail weave using a tapestry needle in to the first single_crochet you made and pull through this will create a ball shape i don t normally use knots but i find tying your tail to the tail you have left over from the start of your foundation keeps it nice and tight use your tail to attach to leaves from home www facebook berries look like before you weave the end into the first single_crochet they look like little fish from home www facebook com/fromhomecrochet holly and berries 2013 insert your hook into your first
